meanings: realize, notice, grasp, find, (formal) perceive, become aware[conscious] of
a man who has attained the highest state of enlightenment

vlive.korean: 저는 왜 이제서야 소중함을 깨달은 걸까요? Why did I realize his importance now? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 문예찬이 내 일상에서 사라졌다. 니가 없으니까 너무 아파 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP 7
vlive.english: Why did I realize his importance now?

vlive.korean: 낚시하고 싶어 - 그때 깨달은 거야? I want to do fishing. - You realized then? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] L.O.Λ.E STORY EP.11 뉴이스트의 우당탕탕 볼링 대결!
vlive.english: I want to do fishing. - You realized then?

vlive.korean: 그래서 - 깨달은 교훈이 있잖아요 뭐예요? So... - We learned a lesson, which is... 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : Halo Berlin
vlive.english: So... - We learned a lesson, which is...

vlive.korean: [갑자기 깨달은 타이밍] 아 근데 이거 마지막에 나가죠 '세잘지' 끝날 때? [A sudden realization] Wait, this comes out after our show is over, huh? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 💦눈물 주의💦 너무너무 아쉬워서 비하인드 하나 더 쪄왔어요.. [ 세상 잘 사는 지은씨2 | 마지막 비하인드 ]
vlive.english: [A sudden realization] Wait, this comes out after our show is over, huh?

vlive.korean: [보고 만거지 자기들은 상큼한 것도 아니란걸 깨달은 거지 존재 가치를 잃고 만거지] 싶었수? [They must have realized they're not as refreshing as ITZY] What's with the pronunciation? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ITZY] 있둥이들 애교에 하이패스로 천국갔더니 세상에 여기선 천사들의 하모니가..💘🎶 (ITZY talking about their 1st place)
vlive.english: [They must have realized they're not as refreshing as ITZY] What's with the pronunciation?

examples.korean: I stood up to speak and—horror of horrors—realized I had left my notes behind. 발음듣기 내가 연설을 하려고 일어섰는데, 이런 끔찍할 데가, 연설문을 두고 안 가져온 것을 깨달은 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I stood up to speak and—horror of horrors—realized I had left my notes behind. 발음

examples.korean: I saw him yesterday and—bam!—I realized I was still in love with him. 발음듣기 내가 어제 그를 봤어. 그런데 쿵! 아직도 내가 그를 사랑하고 있다는 걸 깨달은 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I saw him yesterday and—bam!—I realized I was still in love with him. 발음

examples.korean: Realizing the harmfulness of the practice, I have given up smoking. 발음듣기 나는 깨달은 바 있어 담배를 끊었다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Realizing the harmfulness of the practice, I have given up smoking. 발음

examples.korean: It was all done in the heat of the moment and I have certainly learned by my mistake. 발음듣기 그것은 충동적으로 한 일이었고 실수를 통해 분명히 깨달은 바가 있었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was all done in the heat of the moment and I have certainly learned by my mistake. 발음

examples.korean: After nine years, you know what I’ve realized? 발음듣기 9년이 지나고 나서야 깨달은 게 뭔지 알아요? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After nine years, you know what I’ve realized? 발음
